content: dogwood leaf hair ties are charming hair accessories that will add style to a classic hairdo this quick project requires very little yarn and is perfect for stash-busting the pattern can be transformed into a unique gift wrap tie belt garland backpack charm or a bookmark by making the i-cord longer make a bunch of colorful leaves for yourself or give them away as gifts this project is completely seamless and features techniques such as judy s magic cast on an i-cord and knitting in the round it is a fun way to learn something new while watching the leaves grow on the needles
